author: prem.konma
title: Konma Labz
description: Lack of talent pool and awareness for the development of smart contracts, API's, Oracles and other Dapps using Haskell/Plutus.
solution: Create & deploy Konma Labz, consisting of Haskell/Plutus developers to further help businesses develop DeFi projects on the Cardano chain.
experience: Konma Labz has attended many hackathons. Using IoT and oracles architecture to advance blockchain technology in 15 sectors.
